description: Technology tree for PyAurora 4X - defines research paths and prerequisites

basic_propulsion.name: Basic Propulsion
basic_propulsion.description: Chemical rockets and basic thrust systems for interplanetary travel. Forms the foundation of space exploration.

advanced_propulsion.name: Advanced Propulsion
advanced_propulsion.description: Ion drives and nuclear thermal propulsion systems. More efficient than chemical rockets for long-distance travel.

fusion_drive.name: Fusion Drive
fusion_drive.description: Fusion-powered spacecraft propulsion systems. Extremely high specific impulse for fast interplanetary travel.

antimatter_drive.name: Antimatter Drive
antimatter_drive.description: The ultimate propulsion technology using matter-antimatter annihilation for unprecedented thrust and efficiency.

fuel_efficiency.name: Fuel Efficiency
fuel_efficiency.description: Advanced fuel management and combustion optimization techniques to extend mission range.

basic_energy.name: Basic Energy Systems
basic_energy.description: Solar panels and chemical batteries for power generation. Essential for any space mission.

nuclear_power.name: Nuclear Power
nuclear_power.description: Fission reactors for high-output power generation. Enables deep space missions beyond solar range.

fusion_power.name: Fusion Power
fusion_power.description: Fusion reactors for clean, high-efficiency power. The key to advanced space technologies.

zero_point_energy.name: Zero Point Energy
zero_point_energy.description: Theoretical extraction of energy from quantum vacuum fluctuations. Revolutionary power source.

energy_storage.name: Energy Storage
energy_storage.description: Advanced battery technologies and energy storage systems for reliable power management.

basic_sensors.name: Basic Sensors
basic_sensors.description: Optical and radio telescopes for basic detection and navigation. Eyes and ears of space exploration.

advanced_sensors.name: Advanced Sensors
advanced_sensors.description: Gravitational wave detectors and advanced imaging systems for precise space surveillance.

quantum_sensors.name: Quantum Sensors
quantum_sensors.description: Quantum entanglement-based sensors for instantaneous detection across vast distances.

deep_space_tracking.name: Deep Space Tracking
deep_space_tracking.description: Long-range tracking systems for monitoring objects throughout the solar system.

basic_computing.name: Basic Computing
basic_computing.description: Digital computers and basic AI systems for ship automation and data processing.

advanced_computing.name: Advanced Computing
advanced_computing.description: Quantum computers and neural networks for complex calculations and decision making.

quantum_computing.name: Quantum Computing
quantum_computing.description: Quantum processors capable of solving previously impossible computational problems.

artificial_intelligence.name: Artificial Intelligence
artificial_intelligence.description: True AI systems capable of independent thought and decision making.

ai_systems.name: AI Systems
ai_systems.description: Expert systems and machine learning for automated ship operations and tactical analysis.

basic_weapons.name: Basic Weapons
basic_weapons.description: Kinetic projectiles and basic laser systems for ship defense and offense.

missile_systems.name: Missile Systems
missile_systems.description: Guided missiles and torpedo systems with improved accuracy and payload delivery.

beam_weapons.name: Beam Weapons
beam_weapons.description: High-energy laser and particle beam weapons for precision strikes.

smart_missiles.name: Smart Missiles
smart_missiles.description: AI-guided missiles capable of complex maneuvering and target recognition.

plasma_weapons.name: Plasma Weapons
plasma_weapons.description: Contained plasma projectiles and streams for devastating close-range combat.

basic_shields.name: Basic Shields
basic_shields.description: Electromagnetic field generators for deflecting incoming projectiles and energy weapons.

advanced_shields.name: Advanced Shields
advanced_shields.description: Multi-layered shield systems with improved efficiency and coverage.

phase_shields.name: Phase Shields
phase_shields.description: Quantum phase-shifted shields that can become intangible to certain attacks.

magnetic_confinement.name: Magnetic Confinement
magnetic_confinement.description: Magnetic field manipulation and control systems for containing plasma and charged particles.

quantum_physics.name: Quantum Physics
quantum_physics.description: Understanding of quantum mechanics and its applications to technology.

particle_physics.name: Particle Physics
particle_physics.description: Study of fundamental particles and their interactions. Key to advanced energy systems.

exotic_matter.name: Exotic Matter
exotic_matter.description: Creation and manipulation of exotic matter with unusual properties like negative mass.

basic_construction.name: Basic Construction
basic_construction.description: Space-based manufacturing and assembly systems for building ships and stations.

automated_construction.name: Automated Construction
automated_construction.description: Robotic construction systems and 3D printing for efficient space-based manufacturing.

self_replicating_systems.name: Self-Replicating Systems
self_replicating_systems.description: Von Neumann machines capable of creating copies of themselves using raw materials.

orbital_shipyards.name: Orbital Shipyards
orbital_shipyards.description: Large-scale orbital facilities for constructing massive spacecraft and stations.

advanced_materials.name: Advanced Materials
advanced_materials.description: Carbon nanotubes, metamaterials, and other exotic substances with superior properties.

smart_materials.name: Smart Materials
smart_materials.description: Materials that can change their properties in response to environmental stimuli.

programmable_matter.name: Programmable Matter
programmable_matter.description: Matter that can be programmed to take any shape or form on command.

nano_technology.name: Nano Technology
nano_technology.description: Manipulation of matter at the molecular and atomic scale for precise control.

basic_biology.name: Basic Biology
basic_biology.description: Understanding of biological systems and their adaptation to space environments.

genetic_engineering.name: Genetic Engineering
genetic_engineering.description: Modification of genetic code to create enhanced organisms and biological systems.

terraforming.name: Terraforming
terraforming.description: Planetary engineering to make worlds suitable for human habitation.

space_medicine.name: Space Medicine
space_medicine.description: Medical techniques and treatments adapted for zero gravity and radiation environments.

basic_logistics.name: Basic Logistics
basic_logistics.description: Supply chain management and resource distribution systems for space operations.

advanced_logistics.name: Advanced Logistics
advanced_logistics.description: Optimized supply chains and automated resource distribution across multiple systems.

resource_management.name: Resource Management
resource_management.description: Efficient extraction, processing, and utilization of raw materials.

asteroid_mining.name: Asteroid Mining
asteroid_mining.description: Extraction of valuable resources from asteroids and small planetary bodies.

atmospheric_processing.name: Atmospheric Processing
atmospheric_processing.description: Large-scale modification of planetary atmospheres for habitability or resource extraction.

megastructures.name: Megastructures
megastructures.description: Engineering of massive space-based structures like Dyson spheres and ring worlds.

faster_than_light.name: Faster Than Light Travel
faster_than_light.description: Theoretical framework for exceeding the speed of light through space-time manipulation.

space_time_physics.name: Space-Time Physics
space_time_physics.description: Advanced understanding of relativity and space-time curvature for practical applications.

warp_drive.name: Warp Drive
warp_drive.description: Alcubierre drive technology for faster-than-light travel by warping space-time.
